title: (11360) Andalusia - Pja Cuatro Vientos
description: Parking next to the police station and a park with fountain, table, playground.

title: (11360) San Roque - 2 Calle Castiella Trasera
description: Parking in the ground at the entrance of San Roque between the road to go to the Casino and the tennis courts. Near the police. View of the rock of Gibraltar in the distance. We stayed the night without any problem, we were alone. We slept well, even though the nearby roads are busy.

title: (11360) San Roque - Av. de Europa
description: Brand new parking lot just at the end of Av. from Europe. Note that this is so new that it is not displayed on Google Maps or the Earth view. Possibility of finding level parking spaces. We spent a quiet night, undisturbed. The tenants use the adjoining land as a dog walking area, but it is quiet at night.

title: (11360) San Roque - s/n Calle la Ermita
title_short: (11360) San Roque - s/n Calle la Ermita
description: Drinking water.

title: (11360) San Roque - 5 Los Sargentos
description: Apartment next to the bullring without services. Ideal to rest. Bars and supermarket nearby. Good place to get to know the city.

title: (11360) San Roque - 14 Calle la Ermita
description: Municipal swimming pools. Useful for a hot shower and they are open early in the morning until 10pm

title: (11360) San Roque - 257 Arrabal Industrial
description: Workshop repair shop accessories private parking emptying black water and filling clean water

title: (11360) San Roque - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Bernardo hostel service area

title: (11360) San Roque - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description:
Gray and black water drain at the Repsol service station ....
no water or electricity

title: (11360) San Roque - 17B1 Arrabal Industrial
description: LPG filling station. 24 hour toilet and shower. 4 euro for shower. You can fill gas bottles here at the gas station, also a restaurant and toilets, a good garage and easy access. Gray water drainage and motorhome washing. Good restaurant to eat with very good quality / price ratio.

title: (11315) Santa Margarita -
description: Parking Close to the motorway (little traffic) with a perfect view of the Rock of Gibraltar.

title: (11313) Puente Mayorga - 8 Calle Soleares
description: Laundromat with detergents included. 5 euros 12kg and 6 euros for 16kg. Drying for 2 euros.

title: (11369) San Roque - 7 Calle Fenicios
description:
A very unassuming carpark at the back of an Industrial estate,close to residential area. Quiet at night, but gets busy early morning with locals jogging, walking dogs and the cleaners. Not a pretty spot and quite noisy at night from the industrial area and the port,but no one bothered us and we used beach showers at night without any spectators. 
Be mindful it's not suitable for lager RVs or Campers as the bridge leading to it is very narrow.

title: (11360) San Roque - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place on the edge of a nature park with several BBQ and picnic areas. No amenities free parking open all year

title: (11314) Campamento - 15 Avenida Granada
description: A little outside a ZA near the city with a low-cost grocery store 1 km away, wide streets and dead-end sidewalks to park even with large vehicles, pedestrians with their dogs and bicycles until nightfall the night. departure of hiking trails in the mountains above the town of Linea

title: (11314) Campamento - Av. Huelva
description: Easy parking lane also for large vehicles.

title: (11300) El Zabal - 63A Carretera Málaga
description: It is a gas station with a shop, a laundry, two (plus 1x pet hair) 8kg machines and two 14 kg. There are 4 dryers aswell. Theres a large supermarket and car park across a small road. (No overnight parking) right next the the laundry they have a pressure washer for the smaller vans. They also have various gas canisters.  Worth noting, its on the same road as 3 pet shops and a veterinary clinic.

title: (11314) Campamento - 1C Calle Las Mimosas
description: Water tap with push button.

title: (11314) San Roque - 1D Calle las Mimosas
description: Next to the Dia store in front of a kindergarten about 15 to 20 minutes from Gibraltar by bike. Quiet place. Water nearby. Perfect in view of the traffic to access Gibraltar especially in summer. Ideal for motorhome camping

title: (11315) El Zabal - 44A Carretera Málaga
description: Small parking lot opposite Aldi. Very noisy because it is right on the main street and people come with loud music in the evenings, but it's okay for sleeping. Next door various shops, workshops, restaurants.

title: (11314) San Roque - 3 Avenida Zaragoza
description:
Self service laundry.
Washing takes 30-35 min.

At Repsol gas station. Parking not a problem even for large vehicles.

title: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - 8 Calle Burgos
title_short: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - 8 Calle Burgos
description: Parking area next to commercial premises. Five minutes to the beach.

title: (11360) San Roque - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area El Pinar del Rey. It is an ideal place, with lots of shade and picnic tables. In spring and summer quite busy; in autumn and winter very quiet. In any case, the nights are very quiet and pleasant, totally surrounded by nature. The pine forest is very large, and is full of parking areas, although not all flat. The one I have located corresponds to a wide area where you can find more or less level parking.

name: Swallows Rest
title: (11379) Swallows Rest
description:
We’d like to introduce you to our microsite “Swallows Rest” where you can come and relax and enjoy the beautiful serenity of the river and rest your wings!

We have 2-3 level grass pitches (approx. 10mx5m) and offer black and grey water emptying, freshwater fill up and electric hookup in our secure area. We are dog friendly and just ask for them to be kept on a lead.

There is direct river access and we provide fishing pitch & kit hire as well as canoe & paddle board rental so that you can explore the river & avian wildlife, with a half an hour paddle to Guadarranque beach. 
Please have a look at our Facebook page  by clicking on the Swallows Rest logo .

Please call /WhatsApp /email or message ahead of your visit to check availability.

Contact Wade or Lisa at Swallow's Rest

title: (11369) San Roque - 2 Calle Real
description: Picnic area with drinking water

title: (11369) San Roque - 1 Calle Redes
description: Mixed parking in front of Playa de Guadarranque

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 1 Carretera de las Industrias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 1 Carretera de las Industrias
description: Water point

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 40 Carretera de las Industrias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 40 Carretera de las Industrias
description: Water tap at the petrol station. Threaded connector, good flow rate

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 9 Avenida de la Colonia
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 9 Avenida de la Colonia
description: Free parking on the road, beside Carrefour shopping center. On the opposite side of the center there is a petrolstation where you can fill fresh water.

title: (11369) San Roque - 10 Calle Redes
description:
Al lado del parking principal de la playa. Es un sitio con árboles, bastante sombra, muy grande y con terreno de arena. 

los baños quedan a unos 200 metros (de 12 a 20 pm). hay un pequeño kiosko en la calle de al lado donde comprar agua y otras cositas. tranquilo, plano, sin muchos coches

title: (11369) San Roque - 31 Calle Redes
description: Playground for children with drinking water the beach is not far from the beach showers are accessible

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 17 Carretera Málaga
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 17 Carretera Málaga
description: Have propane bottles for 14, -!

title: (11315) Santa Margarita - 908 Poligono Sector 14C
description: Ample parking next to the beach. In the parking lot near the lighthouse young people usually gather with bottles, but in principle not, although there were cans and remains on the ground. It has some less unevenness in the lower part. The area is very quiet, and the beach has showers. We spent the night in peace.

name: Camping Sureuropa
title: (11315) Camping Sureuropa
description: Quiet campsite. Home nice, downtown about 4 km. Sanitary clean. No dogs allowed!!!

title: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - 5 Camino Sobrevela
title_short: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - 5 Camino Sobrevela
description: Large gravel site on a road

title: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Carretera Residencia
title_short: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Carretera Residencia
description: Super parking space on the beach, next to a hotel. View protected and with free public outdoor beach shower. At night every hour the Guardia Civil looks to the right.

title: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Camino Estepona
title_short: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Camino Estepona
description:
Day parking. Not recommended for sleeping as it is a meeting point for young people in the area to drink, get high and play loud music. 
Free parking with great views of Gibraltar. In contrast to the neighboring pitch are the places just aligned and no motorcross riders nearby.  Very quiet. No ver and disposal available!

title: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Camino Estepona
title_short: (11315) La Línea de la Concepción - Camino Estepona
description: Free parking No services 20 meters from the beach. Very calm. Beach for dogs. The Line of Concepcion to 10 minutes. Gibraltar 10 minutes.

title: (11315) Santa Margarita - Unnamed Road
description: Very large area that stretches along the coast for about a kilometer. Along the dirt road there are many sights and places to stop. However, the place is frequented by locals who take a walk or go fishing.

title: (11315) Santa Margarita - Unnamed Road
description: On the beach, better 4x4

title: (11315) Santa Margarita -
description:
On the beach, in the shade of the trees. Unpaved road but you don't need a 4x4.
It's not possible to sleep, the police are watching

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 120 Avenida de España
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 120 Avenida de España
description: Superb parking 1.5 km from Gibraltar!

title: (11379) Los Barrios - Calle Brújula
description: One of the many car parks around here... This one is emptier than most of the others. Away from the big roads it was quiet at night. It's behind the Media Markt. No facilities.

title: (11315) Santa Margarita -
description: Quiet place accessible beautiful and clean

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 23 Calle Andalucía
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 23 Calle Andalucía
description: Parking street next to a supermarket and a school. The supermarket is open from 7 until 22h during summer. Walking distance to the beach. Toilet in the supermarket.

title: (11360) Estación Férrea -
description:
Nice secluded location on a dirt road. low campers can stand among the population. the rest next door.
there are a lot of power cables here, but they hardly make any noise. very quiet here. 4g range, but no facilities. the road from the zone recreativa (where overnight stays are prohibited with a sign) to here is a bit on the bad side, this bad part is only a few hundred meters of bad road surface.
25 minutes drive to Gibraltar. no amenities.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 26 Calle la Almadraba
description: Shaded car park overlooking the beach, WC, shower, family beach, no surcharge in August accessible by motorhome

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 12 Calle el Greco
description: Quite parking lot in suburban area. next to a small park and field. Lidl/Decathlon nearby. good place to stay for one night.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 39 Calle Guadacorte
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 39 Calle Guadacorte
description: Parking directly at the sea. Great to stay overnight, the beach empties in the evening. Traffic is pretty noisy all night though, it's right on the street. It has showers and a jetty through the sand to the sea.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 14 Calle la Almadraba
description: Sandy car park with direct access to the beach.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 33 Calle San Pablo
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 33 Calle San Pablo
description: Laundromat. Detergent and softener not included in the price but can be added as an option .

name: Camping La Casita Cadiz
title: (11360) Camping La Casita Cadiz
description:
The campsite "La Casita Cadiz" offers basic services for the motorhome
the services are reserved for the client of the campsite
a thai restaurant nearby.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 5 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
title_short: (11379) Los Barrios - 5 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
description: Paved parking next to the Mercadona. Parking closed outside, so enough space. Great place if you are waiting for the ferry, or coming from the ferry :)

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 2 Calle las Arenas
description: Quiet parking except in summer for the beach and departure time or entrance to school

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 3 Calle Federico Chueca
description: Large parking all around a park. Inside there are games for children, a water fountain and picnic tables. Ideal for eating while waiting to take the boat. Less than 20 minutes from the port of Algeciras.

title: (11379) Palmones - 14 Calle el Trasmayo
description: It's a quiet place and it's near the beach.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 1 Calle Carboneros
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 1 Calle Carboneros
description: Self-service laundry, very economical prices, washed 3 euros, dried 2 euro.open every day from 08:00 to 22:00

title: (11379) Palmones - s/n Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
title_short: (11379) Palmones - s/n Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
description: Gas station also offers free water connection. The water pressure is not particularly high, which is why it takes some time to fill up.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 2 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
title_short: (11379) Los Barrios - 2 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
description: Parking Mac Donald, Lidl, great Mercadona. Parking day and night. Many motorhome awaiting departure for the Morocco. Travel Office Guitterez near ferry Tangier Med specialist.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 1 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
title_short: (11379) Los Barrios - 1 Carretera Acceso Central Térmica
description: Carrefour gas station with free water connection. However, I do not give a guarantee of drinking water ;). In theory, gray water can also be disposed of here.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 4 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 4 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Exclusive camper pitch in Alcaidesa Marina. Very safe and quiet. Close to the two towns of La Línea and Gibraltar. Ten minutes walk. The beaches of Poniente and Levante are also nearby (a bit more secluded). The promenade is an area of unforgettable walks and sunsets. Restaurants and cafes in the same port and on the promenade. The climate of the port is cooler than other surrounding towns due to its location, which makes the stay very attractive.

title: (11379) Palmones - C. Fragata, 30
description: Large car park with the possibility of selling tickets for the ferry to Morocco in the immediate vicinity

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 24 Avenida Andalucía
description: Car park near the river/sea. No services. Quiet place.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 2D Paseo del Mediterráneo
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 2D Paseo del Mediterráneo
description: Street parking with easy access to the beach, beach showers, WC (closed off season) and 20 minutes walking distance from the border with Gibraltar. Wonderful view of the Rock of Gibraltar, overnight allowed (may be noisy at night, it is a street parking afterall).

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 25 Avenida Veinte de Abril
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 25 Avenida Veinte de Abril
description: A small guided laundry. You pay the same as if you do it yourself, but do the laundry :). People are very nice and very clean.

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 5 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 5 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Parking lot, near the border. Expensive.

title: (11300) Cádiz - 11J Calle de la Villa Real
title_short: (11300) Cádiz - 11J Calle de la Villa Real
description: Long street with turning hammer at the end. Great view to Gibraltar and right on the beach. Two more mobile homes were parked here.

title: (11379) Los Barrios - 2 Calle Fragata
description: Gas refill in a professional DIY store

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 230 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 230 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Parking lot between the beach and the road. Lots of spots available. Maybe just big enough for a Campervan like ours. We parked here for three nights and no one told us to leave. No fines and no signs :)

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Parking 100 meters from the border. Blue zone but not paid on holidays and nights.

title: (11360) San Roque - 50 Alcaidesa
description: Wow!!!! Came and see! Stunning views

title: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 230 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
title_short: (11300) La Línea de la Concepción - 230 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Parking spaces in a quiet area. Stood here with several Womo s practicing night. I don't know if you can park here during the day. The place is straight and paved. One at the foot of the rock?

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - Westside Road
description: Parking of supermarket up to 3 hours, safe

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 1 Corral Road
description:
Not suitable for large motorhomes very tight
to get around and no large spaces. Public parking 100 meters from the center of Gibraltar. For a fee from 9 to 19 to 1.40 euros per hour. Free on Saturday afternoons and Sundays. Parked with 540 van. Night without any problem with street lamps.

title: (11360) San Roque - 10 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Great place near the lighthouse

title: (11360) San Roque - 25 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Nice place to park for free with a van next to a lighthouse and beautiful beaches. Great view and sunsets. When we went in August we were alone at night, but I don't know if that's still the case.

title: (11205) Algeciras - 16 Calle Cabo Espartel
description: Parking on the street in a residential area, very quiet to spend the night. It is 10 min walk from the Riconcillo beach.

title: (11360) San Roque - 109 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Quiet and peaceful place, view of Gibraltar and the Moroccan coasts, in the immediate vicinity of an unsupervised beach.

title: (11205) Algeciras - 1A Carretera Rinconcillo
description: It is a wide and flat parking lot. But it is the meeting point for cars and motorcycles at night from 3 to 5, people with cars running, talking and noises do not stop.

title: (11360) San Roque - 102 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Are of quiet tranquility and a step away from the beach. You can sit and cook if you have difficulties.

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 1 Sir Herbert Miles Road
description: A great place after the parking lot has been cleared. We arrived at 10 in the morning. If you try to spend the night, the street cleaners have the power to put a boot on you. Take the #4 bus to the gondola or kick back and enjoy the beach.

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - Cormorant Wharf
description: QueensWay Quay Laundry in Gibraltar. The entrance is made from a paid parking lot, but you can stay there for a maximum of 15 minutes for free, just enough time to send clothes to the laundry. It is located next to the Waterfront restaurant. Friendly staff who perform the service on the same day, although there is also the possibility of self-service. Affordable prices. Very close to downtown, about a 10 minute walk to Main Street.

title: (11360) San Roque - 102 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Great place kilometers long, wide sandy beach with many parking options. Sand track only. Overlooking the Rock of Gebraltar.

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 4a Ragged Staff Road
description: Paid parking lot very close the one for the cable car. Parking allowed only during the day. Not very easy to park with a very large vehicle (we were able to park our ~6m van in a single spot)

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 1 Red Sands Road
description: Large parking lot. However, the parking lot is not big if you get on the edge, but you don't have any problems.

title: (11351) Castellar de la Frontera - 34 Calle del Soto
title_short: (11351) Castellar de la Frontera - 34 Calle del Soto
description: The maximum stay is 72 hours. Paved parking lot. It is next to a road but with little traffic. Next to the municipal swimming pool. There is a park nearby to take a walk

title: (11205) Algeciras - 2 Avenida Bélgica
description: Parking for day and night. In the algecireño neighborhood of San José Artesano. People at a celebrations venue and a cafeteria. Quiet and safe residential space. It is on the other side of an esplanade of albero when crossing a pedestrian bridge. Very well connected to exit and enter the city through the north access. Esplanade parking next to a beautiful garden.

title: (11205) Algeciras - 2A Carretera Rinconcillo
description: Quiet parking right next to an old cemetery and a petanque and athletic track very quiet area

title: (11204) Algeciras - 340 Carretera Málaga
description: At the gas station (next to Burger King) there is a machine for water (and air pressure).

title: (11204) Algeciras - 30 Avenida Virgen del Carmen
description: I stayed here after arriving by boat from Morocco. On the side of the road in front of the Mercadona. Had a quiet night.

title: (11202) Algeciras - 7 Calle José Carlos de Luna
title_short: (11202) Algeciras - 7 Calle José Carlos de Luna
description: Lavanderia Auto Servicing ECO Spin. Self service laundry including detergent and softener in price. Cash only. There is a change machine in the shop.

title: (11202) Algeciras - 55 Avenida Virgen del Carmen
description: Public parking. perfect for visiting the city center. The police there are nice, they don't bother you if you're not camping.

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 1 7th Rosia Battery
description: This area is known as Rosia Bay. To arrive you have to drive down a steep hill and through a tunnel (not sure the height yet) the area is normally used for dog walkers and young adult to hang around. At night it is quite quiet and it’s right next to the ocean. Aslong as you can get up the hill you should be fine. Secluded area from main road.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - 5 Calle Padre Damaso
description: Dirt apartment, without services, although in Google Maps an unpaved road comes for access but it is fixed, it has access to a gas station, pizzeria and shops

title: (11201) Algeciras - 43C Avenida Virgen del Carmen
description: Next to the port. Free parking. Perfect for one night when you have to catch your ferry in the morning. Big parking but noisy because of the port. 2 Entrances

title: (11204) Algeciras - Ctra. Cádiz-Málaga
description: Parking of the Carrefour supermarket, with enough places without height limit, near banks, GYM, bars, gas station and spare parts for cars, bus stop 500m, downtown 45min, good views, ring road nearby.

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - 7th Rosia Battery
description: Clean and modern sanitary house. Unfortunately, showers are closed

title: (11370) Los Barrios - 19 Calle Herrería
description: Laundry with large machines. Please note, only coins are accepted. Possibility to park nearby. Clean and pleasant.

title: (11201) Algeciras -
description:
Secured car parking lot. This is a payed park however provides security. often police rounds and cameras available. in this area you have two types of parking. Fast for a 24h staying and an extended visit parking lot for more than one day. we arrived here in the night before visiting Ceuta, sleep here and woke up early in the morning to catch the ferry. you can try to check if you like it as the first 20 minutes are free. quiet at night.
1 minute walk from the ferry.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - 30 Avenida del Tercer Centenario
title_short: (11370) Los Barrios - 30 Avenida del Tercer Centenario
description: It is a very large parking lot, close to a Mercadona, gas station and other services. Quiet area, illuminated, a bit noisy and is located at the entrance of the town. On Friday you cannot stay overnight, because on Saturday they have a market, therefore on Saturday you cannot park.

title: (11201) Algeciras - 36 Calle Pablo Mayayo
description: Laundry

title: (11203) Algeciras -
description: Automatic laundry: Washing machines and Dry linen.  Only accept coins but there is a machine to make money.  There is parking in front, easy to park.  (there is a bank opposite)

title: (11201) Algeciras - 3 Avenida Virgen del Carmen
description: Source to fill free drinking water just outside the port

title: (11201) Algeciras - 5a Calle Duque de Almodóvar
description:
Small Laundry 3 Machines (10-10-15Kg) and 2 Dryers. Washing in 30-40min.

Very clean, fast. Think about cash.
Several cafes around to wait.

Better to park at the large paid parking lot on the street next door

title: (11370) Los Barrios - CA-9209
description: Picnic area with tables next to the Palmones River, with eucalyptus trees that provide shade. Car noise near the national but quiet and traveled by pedestrians and cyclists

title: (11207) Algeciras - Dársena El Saladillo
description: -It's a port car park. -The area is very quiet and overnight stays are allowed. -It is very good to spend one or more nights and it is next to the port in case you have to go out with the ferry. -About 200 meters you have Mercadona, a Bazaar, Bars, Gas Stations, Hospital, Hardware Stores ect..

title: (GX11 1AA) Gibraltar - Europa Point
description: Sign was put up saying no overnight stays. Parking at the europa point (maximum length 5 / 6m). good for the hike on the rock of Gibraltar. I only spent the day. If you want to go up, ask the staff at the entrance to the national park (10 minute walk uphill) for the Mediterranean stages.

title: (11360) Pueblo Nuevo - 18 Calle Sierra Bermeja
description: We were looking for a washing machine here have 20 km 15 km and 10 km dryer 20 kg 15 kg on average the wash cycle is 30 minutes no matter if you go to 15:00 or within 20 km there is a vending machine and great service

title: (11207) Algeciras - 43 Calle Rosa de los Vientos
title_short: (11207) Algeciras - 43 Calle Rosa de los Vientos
description: We stayed here for one night before the ferry leaves for Morocco. On Saturday evening you can hear music from a disco nearby. Not very loud and we sleep well. Parking is video-monitored, probably from the customs. Access to the car park leads from the roundabout through a gate. The gate was open in the evening and morning and is also the entrance to the small fishing port.

title: (11207) Algeciras - 31D Calle Rosa de los Vientos
title_short: (11207) Algeciras - 31D Calle Rosa de los Vientos
description: Drinking water, strong flow, next to the playground, lot of parking spots (Just for fullfill the water)

title: (11207) Algeciras - 29 Calle Ponce de León
description: "frii" gas station next to the car wash (for cars only up to 2.9m high). The gentleman accepts that you come with your bottle. Not to be confused with the Repsol station next door (not tested as far as I'm concerned).

title: (11207) Algeciras - 5 Calle Monaco
description: Gas station where it is possible to fill a bottle of LPG. The gentleman is very nice and helped us find the right tip to come and put his adapter!

title: (11370) Los Barrios - Unnamed Road
description: Good start of the Puerta Verde de Algeciras trail. Nice views

title: (11370) Los Barrios - C-440a
description: Area to fill water and LPG. Convenient before or after embarkation for Morocco.

title: (11310) San Roque - 1 Puerto Sotogrande
description:
Large day parking space.
Possibility to take a shower at the toilet of the café.

title: (11206) Algeciras - 2 Calle los Barrios
description: Here you can buy a propane tank at Repsol office

title: (11207) Algeciras - 2T Urbanizacion Ue los Pastores Sur
title_short: (11207) Algeciras - 2T Urbanizacion Ue los Pastores Sur
description: Water dispenser at a bp gas station. Water pressure also sufficient for filter systems.

title: (11350) Castillo de Castellar -
description: Parking for max. 2 vans or mobile homes at the viewpoint of the dam. It is not possible to continue to the dam. Access is blocked with no possibility of turning. Very quiet and secluded.

title: (11207) Algeciras - 60 Urbanización los Jazmines
description: ECOSPIN self-service industrial laundry

title: (11350) Castellar de la Frontera -
description: Nice rural place near a eucalyptus grove and creek so ample shade for summer. Quick access off main highway on flat dirt roads.

title: (11207) Algeciras - Paseo Playa Getares Peatonal
description: Quiet place

title: (11310) San Roque - 26 Puerto Sotogrande
description: Parking at the entrance to the Sotogrande marina. No services.

title: (11310) San Roque - Puerto Sotogrande
description: Laundry wash, drier, parking right next to it. If you continue down the breakwater road until the end there comes the harbor control tower and a gas station for boats. There is also a water hose to refill water for free. However, whenever the parking lots of the harbor fill up with visitors (weekends and dinner time weekdays) the gates are closed and they will not let you in with AC or security will immediately come and tell you to leave.

title: (11207) Algeciras - 1 Calle Playa Algetares
description: Public parking, we had a very quiet night

title: (11312) San Roque - 56 Las Camelias
description: This parking lot is for winter only. Parking is prohibited during summer and holidays. Parking at the beach and beautiful view. A dozen RVs are parked here during my visit. Places slightly sloping without service. Small supermarket 100m away. Please support the supermarket

title: (11350) Castillo de Castellar - 6 Carretera Castillo V Almoraima
title_short: (11350) Castillo de Castellar - 6 Carretera Castillo V Almoraima
description: Free parking near Castellar Castle

title: (11207) Algeciras - 37 Calle Orion
description: Beach. edge of town. Green

title: (11360) San Roque - 107 Las Camelias
description: Waterpipe in the park.

title: (11312) Torreguadiaro - 7 Calle La Jara
description: Fuente de agua con grifo en una esquina de un parque infantil, hay que apretar constantemente para que salga el agua, algo molestoso, pero tiene mucha presión, está a 2 metros de la calle, sin mucha circulación

title: (11370) Los Barrios - CA-221
description: Entrance of the bicycle trail. some passage of rangers and other cars who have the authorisation and have to step out to open the gate. very beautiful trail of 20kms. everybody very friendly.

title: (11360) San Diego - Av. Mar del Sur
title_short: (11360) San Diego - Av. Mar del Sur
description: Large parking next to the road, in front of the Milla de Plata hotel, and next to the hotel a path to the beach, very uncrowded as it has many rocks, transparent waters

title: (11360) San Diego -
description: Motorhome parking. Simple place with no services. Muddy when it rains. beautiful view. pretty close to the main road so a bit noisy.

title: (11312) San Roque - 67 Urbanización San Diego
description: access for small cars, we have to pass the tunnel through the baixo da nacional. Agree with a marvelous view, with Gibraltar at the bottom.

title: (11360) San Roque - 4 Urbanización Invespania
description: Fallow future residential area with great views of Gibraltar .. Access steep .. Absolutely quiet. Beware of wind ... Exposed ...

title: (11207) Algeciras - 50A Lugar Getares
description: Parking space on the edge of the village of Punta Carnero. Beautiful view of the coast of Morocco. Very quiet place

title: (29691) Margen Izquierdo - Carretera A7
description: A Repsol station with a shower. It looks bad but there is hot water. It’s free. Ask for the key in the gas station. The shower is in a small building next to the ticket office.

title: (29692) Manilva - 415D Urbanizacion Playa Paraiso
description: Parking overnight no problem.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - C-440a
description: Picnic area with campfire pitches. Large parking. Slightly sloping .. Good to stay at night.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - 2 Diseminado Poligono 23
description: Nice quiet place to spend the night. Next to a small road but no circulation after 8 PM and not much during the day either. There is the highway not to far so you can here it a bit, but not bothering at night. There is a trail that takes you to the resting area and a trail where u can make a hike.

title: (11370) Los Barrios -
description: Ideal place to disconnect in the middle of nature. It has picnic tables with barbecue (call and ask the civil guard in times of drought). away from noise

title: (11370) Los Barrios - A-381
description: A tiny parking area for two or three camper vans max ... But by the start of a nice walk to the Casas Cuevas and great stargazing. Traffic sounds but still peaceful.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - C-440a
description: Little parking lot, hidden from the road. A hike starts here. Lot's of mountainbikers come here in the weekend.  We had nice stay here.

title: (11391) Algeciras -
description: Very bad road that you have to be very skilled to go up with the van or 4x4. Very deep trickles. Not suitable for motorhomes. Spectacular views and you can start routes from here. I repeat, do not go up if you are not able to lend it.

title: (29692) Manilva - 3D Urbanización Manilva Beach
description: Small shadow. In front of the beach. Perfect to spend the day. Solo camper very steep and narrow entrance

title: (11200) Algeciras - Unnamed Road
description: Nice quiet place just off the main road but not disturbed by it. Not many level points but ok. No services.

name: Camping La Bella Vista
title: (29692) Camping La Bella Vista
description: Camping Bella Vista, great comfort, health luxury. Parcel bounded by vegetation. Each location has supplies water, electricity, TV, wifi, and wastewater evacuation. Mini Market and restaurant. Set on the edge of beach and 200 m from the Marina.

title: (11391) El Bujeo -
description: Lots of possibilities around here, this place is in a flat meadow. Access is easy by the paved road from El Cuarton, otherwise 4x4s can have fun taking the track from El Bujeo. You will be surrounded by cows, horses and sheep. In the distance we see the Moroccan coast. Possibility to walk on the ridges, the view is beautiful, but be careful with your phone, mine is connected to a 4G antenna from Morocco... There is a source with a tap 50m from this point, but you will have to look for it a bit.

title: (11380) Tarifa - 12 El Pueblo
description: Stayed for just a few hours to sleep at night before catching the ferry to Morrocco. Free safe parking place!

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2a Avenida de Espana
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2a Avenida de Espana
description: Parking allowed by City Hall. You can access the town and the promenade on foot through the footbridge.

title: (29691) Manilva - 1 Arrabal Cementerio Nuevo
description: Parking on the outskirts of Manilva. The buses park there. We asked the police and they told us that we could stay parked, without taking anything out. We had a good night. It is lit by some spotlights

title: (29691) Manilva -
description: Very nice spot at the riverside with many possibilities to park. The dirt road might be difficult if wet, but it is easy accessible eith a Sprinter sized van for example. beautiful view into the landscape and very calm asswell. quite a lot dirt lying around, though. pick some of it up and take a dive in the river Guadiaro. probably quite nice for fishing, too.

title: (29691) Manilva - 2 Arrabal sin Nomre Ma
description: Large green sandy area with space for Womo/Van's Perfect for one night.

title: (29691) Manilva -
description:
On the left bank of the rio, totally flat location, 10 m from the river.
little water but very pleasant. fish galore, frogs at night. a very quiet night, saw no one.
the road to get there is a very rolling gravel road, accessible to all vehicles. To recommend

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Very clean laundromat. Close parking in Avenida de Espana, even for large camper vans. Cash only, but they have a change machine. 8 a.m. - 11 p.m. very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 4 Calle Virgen de África
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 4 Calle Virgen de África
description: A quiet place without water service or drains but for a weekend, it's good

title: (29690) Casares - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet spot by the river. We first went to the one on the map a little south along the river, but it was dirty and muddy. This area is bigger, offers more possibilities and has small pebbles as a surface so not as dirty. Sounds of the river and the birds. Very peaceful.

title: (29692) Manilva - 6 Calle la Florida
description: Laundromat at a Repsol service station

title: (29692) Manilva - 9 Diseminado Camino de Estepona
description: Large paved public car park. Two water points are located near the service premises. 5 minutes by car from the baths. same for the Lidl.

title: (29691) Manilva - Cam. los Baños
description: Nice spot to spend few nights in the nature. There are several hiking routes (4-8km long) and a Roman Bath (Baños romanos de la Hedionda.) Easy access to the city.

title: (11370) Los Barrios - A-381
description: Place for one van just off the road. level ground. great views. sunset.

title: (29690) Manilva - Camino los Baños
description: Great place to park, near Bašos de la Hedionda, busy at weekends but worth it. parking under the bridge with 8m camper is ok. right on the creek. Not really suitable for overnight stays.

title: (29691) Manilva -
description: Parking/overnight stay just below the bridge at the creek. 500m to the Roman bath. There is another large parking space a few meters further, but it is very crooked and uncomfortable and not suitable for overnight stays.

title: (29690) Marina de Casares - 2 Marina Urbanization Casares
title_short: (29690) Marina de Casares - 2 Marina Urbanization Casares
description: Public parking with playground on the beach, only day parking and for short Campers.

title: (11380) Tarifa - E-5
description: Great vantage point. Straits to Gibraltar and Morocco

title: (11380) Tarifa - CA-2215
description: Higher than first place. Several roads and parking lots at the foot of the wind turbines overlooking the sea and the Moroccan mountains. We parked on the side of the road to protect ourselves from the wind and even had some shade. A little traffic but as it is a dirt road people drive slowly.

title: (29690) Marina de Casares - 1 Marina Urbanization Casares
title_short: (29690) Marina de Casares - 1 Marina Urbanization Casares
description: This stop provided a quiet area to park overnight where no prohibition signs were present on the 12.02.22.

title: (11380) El Bujeo -
description:
Parking at the entrance to the wind farm.n the N 340.
Magnificent views of Morocco and the inland mountains.
Best gravel trails for a hike.
Traffic on the N 340 clearly increased, but quiet at night.

title: (29690) Bahía de Casares - 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia
title_short: (29690) Bahía de Casares - 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia
description: Simple parking in a residential area. Facing the sea, access to the beach.

address.street: 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia

title: (29690) Casares - A-377
description: At the foot of the wind turbines. Maginfique view. The opportunity to verify that wind turbines do not make so much noise!

title: (11339) Los Ángeles - 5 Diseminado el Tropezon
description: Drinking water, good to fill the tank.

title: (29690) Casares del Mar - 82 Lugar Urbanizacion Casares del Mar
title_short: (29690) Casares del Mar - 82 Lugar Urbanizacion Casares del Mar
description: Parking with access to Perros beach!

title: (29693) Buenas Noches - 7A Calle Tranquila
description: Automatic laundry service station. Well coming back from Morocco especially for the laundry of course. Day parking only

title: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 6 Calle Pasada de Alcalá
title_short: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 6 Calle Pasada de Alcalá
description: Parking is very quiet. ideal for conocrr the village of Jimena de la Frontera. good food, streets tipicas. visit to the Castle. on Friday they put flea market in the morning and parking is not available.

title: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 11 Avenida los Deportes
title_short: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 11 Avenida los Deportes
description: Quiet place to spend the night and spend the day. It is located next to the school. We spend the weekend and we have everything at hand. No noise and very calm. In the corner, a bar where you can have breakfast with churros and chocolate.

title: (11380) Tarifa - 6 CA-9210
description: Space almost BEFORE the Santuario. Beautiful view.

title: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 2 Calle Fuente Nueva
title_short: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - 2 Calle Fuente Nueva
description: Parking at the entrance to the city. Well located for visiting the castle and the village. Only for short cars with max 6,50m

title: (11380) Tarifa - 2 E-5
description: This is a bird migration stop, so it would be nice to keep the space for this purpose. it was full after 10am, but a lot of place during the night.

title: (11330) Jimena de la Frontera - A-405
description: Large parking for the cemetery. Quiet night unlike the parking lots in the surrounding villages. Shade, 4G and fresh water accessible in the nearby cemetery.

name: Camping Alcornocales
title: (11330) Camping Alcornocales
description: Jimena de la Frontera, C-3331. Camping Alcornocales

title: (11391) Tarifa - 6 CA-221
description: Los Tornos recreational area. open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. With water fountains and garbage containers. Picnic areas in a very well-kept young cork oak forest. Kiosk beach bar in the same area.

title: (29693) Estepona - 3P Urbanizacion SUP06 Arroyo Vaquero Play
title_short: (29693) Estepona - 3P Urbanizacion SUP06 Arroyo Vaquero Play
description: Very quiet area with battery parking and very close to the Costa Natura beach.

title: (29690) Casares - 46D Calle Chorrete
description: Small plot of land very close to the village of Casares and next to the school, quiet and small and beautiful city to visit. Mountain village very close to Estepona.

title: (29693) Estepona - 2A Urbanizacion Sup
description: Parking is on a side street and very quiet at night. It is 600 m to ALDI, 250 m to MERCADONA. There is a beach nearby, 1500 m, and even a nudist beach. As, unfortunately very often, the naturists get the bad parts of the beach. The parking strips even offer space for longer WoMos. (7.5 m) Please always remember, we are guests in Spain - so NO camping, NO garbage disposal and NO emptying cassettes - Thank you, because I want to be able to come to Spain more often.

title: (29690) Casares - C. Guardia Civil
description: We spent the night here without any problem the other car parks were full

title: (29690) Casares - A-7150
description: Next to it there is a tourist information office and a lookout point. It is possible to reach the center of Casares with a pedestrian access of 1.2 km just to the left of the Tourist Office. The wastewater disposal is on the left at the tourist center about 50 meters down the street on the right. An inconspicuous shaft with a metal cover.

title: (29690) Casares - Calle Guardia Civil
description: Parking in front of a school, superb view of the city of Casares. The civil guardia passed in the evening around 22:30.

title: (29690) Casares - 26 MA8300
description: Ideal parking for small camper, near the city.

title: (29690) Casares - 1T Carretera Estepona
description: Large car park at the exit of the village. Beautiful view of the mountains and the ocean in the distance. On the other hand the small mountain road passes not very far, we hear the light traffic of the latter.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 2 CA-221
description: Fountain available along a road where there is also a mountain bike trail. The road is blocked a little further. Quiet corner where we ate under the supervision of two very curious horses.

title: (11380) Pedro Valiente -
description: Good place to spend the night

title: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - 6 A-405
description: Gasolinera Repsol, for refueling, free drainage of gray water, waste water and filling with clean water. There is also washing for Motorhome.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Calle Algeciras
description: Source of drinking water in a small village where locals also fill up their canisters.

title: (11380) Tarifa - Ctra. Cádiz-Málaga
description:
Large parking lot with a great view above the supermarket. Gravel and partly oblique. no service

Free toilets are located at the gas station, you have to get the key from the gas station attendant. There are also paid showers here.

title: (11380) Tarifa - E-5
description:
Simple parking in gravel in front of the Playa de Los Lances walk. there are 3-4 parking spots on the other side of the road but too small for medium and large campervan. 
obviously not the best for sleeping long but does the job for early morning birding on the board walk

title: (11380) Tarifa - 612p Polígono Industrial La Vega
description: Tariff. Fills German and French gas cylinders. Gas station. Laverie Lavomatic (parts available at the service station). Supply and disposal for Womos. So complete program.

title: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - San Pablo de Buceite
title_short: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - San Pablo de Buceite
description: Small spot at the edge of the river. Clean, 20 m below a playground. Access by a path between bamboos, ok for vans but not for motorhomes. The road (bridge) is not very far but little noise.

title: (11380) Tarifa - 58 Calle Algeciras
description: Automatic washing machines hot water showers.

title: (11380) Tarifa - 3 Barriada Virgen del Sol
description: Free parking located flat 20 minutes from the center of Tarifa.

title: (11380) - 220P Urbanizacion la Marina
description: Washing tunnel suitable for vans. Supports vehicles up to 2.20 m high. It's behind Mercadona.

title: (11380) Tarifa - 3 Tarif Ben Malek
description: Clear parking for our car. In Tarifa, there is not much left over of car parks.
